head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths TANNER, LOUISE FRITH STICKNEY

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths TANNER, LOUISE FRITH STICKNEY

block.p: TANNER-Louise Frith Stickney. On May 15, 2000 following a brief struggle with cancer. Born February 16th, 1922 in New York. Adored mother of Michael and Betsy. Grandmother of Henry. Wife of the late Patrick Tanner. Funeral service on Friday May 19th at 10 AM at St. George's Church on Stuyvesant Square (209 E. 16th Street). Interment at St. James Episcopal Church in St. James, Long Island. ''...For God loveth a cheerful giver''.
TANNER-Louise. The National Board of Review of Motion Pictures deeply regrets the passing of our beloved boardmember, Louise Tanner. Always a source of support and friendship.
